headline: Rockwell Automation (ROK) Valuation Check After Bologna Customer Experience Center Launch
summary: Rockwell Automation (ROK) has opened its Bologna Customer Experience Center in Europe, giving machine builders and manufacturers hands-on access to automation, artificial intelligence and digital twin tools as industry pressures keep attention on efficiency and resilience. See our latest analysis for Rockwell Automation. Recent news around the Bologna Customer Experience Center, new OEM research and customer wins has arrived alongside mixed short term moves and stronger long term gains, with...
